newsitem.title: AUSTRIA: Several parties interested in Creditanstalt - Klima.
newsitem.headline: Several parties interested in Creditanstalt - Klima.

text.p: Austrian Finance Minister Viktor Klima on Tuesday said several investors had flagged an interest in Creditanstalt, the country's longest running privatisation candidate.
"I have a sufficient number of interested parties," Klima told Reuters after a cabinet meeting.

A source close to the ministry said Klima had received between three and five requests for an information memorandum on the bank prepared by investment bank JP Morgan, the government's advisor in the sale.
Klima is expected to close the bidding period for the government's 70 percent voting stake in the bank on November 15. -- Vienna newsroom +431 53112 274
